00008 void Cell::print(){
00009         cout << "POS: " << this->x << " - " << this->y << endl;
00010         cout << "SIZE " << this->size << endl;
00011         cout << "COLOR " << this->r <<" - "<< this->g <<" - "<<this->b << endl;
00012         cout << "VERTICES" << endl;
00013 
00014         for (int i=0;i<4;i++){
00015                 cout << "P" << i << ": " << this->vertex[i].x << " - " << this->vertex[i].y << endl;
00016         }
00017 }

00020 //==========================================================================================================
00021 Cell::Cell(float x, float y, float size){
00022 
00023         this->x = x;
00024         this->y = y;    
00025         this->size = size;
00026 
00027         this->r = CELL_DEFAULT_R;
00028         this->g = CELL_DEFAULT_G;
00029         this->b = CELL_DEFAULT_B;
00030 
00031         this->vertex[0].x = this->x - this->size / 2.0;
00032         this->vertex[0].y = this->y - this->size / 2.0;
00033         this->vertex[1].x = this->x - this->size / 2.0;
00034         this->vertex[1].y = this->y + this->size / 2.0;
00035         this->vertex[2].x = this->x + this->size / 2.0;
00036         this->vertex[2].y = this->y + this->size / 2.0;
00037         this->vertex[3].x = this->x + this->size / 2.0;
00038         this->vertex[3].y = this->y - this->size / 2.0;
00039 }

00043 int Cell::setColor(float r, float g, float b){
00044         this->r=r; this->g=g; this->b=b;
00045         return 0;
00046 }

00049 //==========================================================================================================
00050 void Cell::publish(visualization_msgs::Marker &marker){
00051         geometry_msgs::Point p;
00052         marker.points.clear();
00053 
00054         for(int i =0;i<4;i++){
00055                 p.x=this->x;
00056                 p.y=this->y;
00057                 p.z=CELL_DEFAULT_HEIGHT;
00058                 marker.points.push_back(p);
00059 
00060                 p.x=this->vertex[i%4].x;
00061                 p.y=this->vertex[i%4].y;
00062                 p.z=CELL_DEFAULT_HEIGHT;
00063                 marker.points.push_back(p);
00064                 
00065                 p.x=this->vertex[(i+1)%4].x;
00066                 p.y=this->vertex[(i+1)%4].y;
00067                 p.z=CELL_DEFAULT_HEIGHT;
00068                 marker.points.push_back(p);
00069         }
00070 
00071         marker.color.r = this->r;
00072         marker.color.g = this->g;
00073         marker.color.b = this->b;
00074         marker.color.a = 1.0;
00075 
00076         marker.pose.position.x = 0;
00077         marker.pose.position.y = 0;
00078         marker.pose.position.z = 0;
00079         marker.pose.orientation.x = 0.0;
00080         marker.pose.orientation.y = 0.0;
00081         marker.pose.orientation.z = 0.0;
00082         marker.pose.orientation.w = 1.0;
00083 
00084         // Set the scale of the marker -- 1x1x1 here means 1m side
00085         marker.scale.x = 1.0;
00086         marker.scale.y = 1.0;
00087         marker.scale.z = 1.0;
00088 }
